root.BusinessItemHeadingNumbered: Motor Vehicles (Driving Licences) (New Drivers): Ten Minute Rule Motion

MotionText.from_cdata: That leave be given to bring in a Bill to make provision about licences issued to new drivers for the period of six months after the issuing of the licence, for the purpose of increasing safety for road users; and for connected purposes.

from_cdata.p: The Member moving and a Member opposing this Motion may each speak for up to 10 minutes.
